name: ParaStyleMappings
shortdesc: A collection of para style mappings.

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new ParaStyleMapping (Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the ParaStyleMapping.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the ParaStyleMapping with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the ParaStyleMappings within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The ParaStyleMapping, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: ParaStyleMapping, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The ParaStyleMapping, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: ParaStyleMapping, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first ParaStyleMapping in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last ParaStyleMapping in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle ParaStyleMapping in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the ParaStyleMapping with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the ParaStyleMapping that follows the desired ParaStyleMapping.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the ParaStyleMapping whose index follows the specified ParaStyleMapping in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The ParaStyleMapping whose index comes before the desired ParaStyleMapping.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any ParaStyleMapping in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every ParaStyleMapping in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the ParaStyleMapping.
Returns the ParaStyleMapping with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
